alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 23 at 2:04PM MDT until October 25 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County and South Laramie Range. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range
